channel.title: Crimes of Passion
channel.description: Every Wednesday, we tell a love story that turns into a crime story. Our subjects might start as lovers, friends, or family, but by the end, there's a criminal and a victim. Along the way, we analyze the relationship dynamics and psychology that lead to betrayal, theft, and even murder. Crimes of Passion is part of the Parcast Network, and a production of Cutler Media.

item.title: Introducing: Malicious Moms
item.description: Hear an exclusive clip from the first episode of Parcast Network’s newest collection, just in time for Mother’s Day. Every Sunday, see how far some women went to help their kids… and how others used motherhood to get away with their misdeeds. From college admissions scandals to “self-defense” ax murders, motherhood’s no walk in the park — and in this series, it’s a minefield. Follow Malicious Moms and listen free, only on Spotify! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Heaven’s Gate Pt. 4: The Exit

They’d abandoned their old lives, embraced a new ideology, weathered the death of a beloved leader… and finally, made themselves worthy of the Next Level. Now, the comet was coming. item.title: Harold Nokes Pt. 2
item.description: In the summer of 1974, a war was brewing between Kay Hoyt Hein and her married lover, Harold Nokes. After she called off their affair, Harold lashed out. He poisoned her lawn. Poured sugar in her gas tank. He even wrote lewd graffiti messages about her sexual activity with other men. Later that year, police would discover Kay parents’ bodies in a lake and dismembered in several parts.   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Parachute Murder
item.description: Two adrenaline junkies quickly became best friends because of their mutual love of skydiving. The pair, Els Clottemans and Els Van Doren, first met in 2005 through a skydiving club in Belgium.  They shared more than just the same name and interests. item.title: Welcome to Crimes of Passion
item.description: The podcast where true love meets true crime. Every week, we’ll explore passionate crimes and the psychology of lethal relationships. How does a marriage progress from husband and wife to killer and victim? Or killer and co-conspirator? If there’s a thin line between love and hate, what manipulates our relationships into deadly results? Crimes of Passion premieres February 20th, with new episodes every Wednesday.
